verses.verse: <S%G5124>This<s%> is the <S%G5154>third<s%> time I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>. <S%G1909>In<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G2476>shall<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> be <S%G2476>established<s%>.

I told you <S%G4280>before<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> say <S%G4302>beforehand<s%>, as <S%G5613>if<s%> I were <S%G3918>present<s%>, the second <S%G1208>time<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> being <S%G548>absent<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G3588>them<s%> which before have <S%G4258>sinned<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3062>others<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064%G99999>come<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, I <S%G5339>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5339>spare<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2532>though<s%> he was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> <S%G769>weakness<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> he <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2249>also<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G846>in<s%> <S%G235>him<s%>, <S%G2198>but<s%> we shall <S%G4862>live<s%> <S%G846>with<s%> <S%G1537>him<s%> <S%G1411>by<s%> the <S%G2316>power<s%> of <S%G1519>God<s%> <S%G5209>toward<s%> <S%G1722>you<s%>.

<S%G3985>Examine<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G1487>whether<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>; <S%G1381>prove<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves<s%>. <S%G3756>Don<s%>'t you <S%G1921>know<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves<s%>, how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1509>unless<s%> you <S%G2075%G99999>are<s%> <S%G96>reprobates<s%>?

<S%G1223%G99999>Therefore<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2443>being<s%> <S%G548>absent<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> being <S%G3918>present<s%> I should <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G664>sharpness<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3619>edification<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2506>destruction<s%>.

<S%G3063>Finally<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G5463>rejoice<s%>. Be <S%G2675>perfected<s%>, be of good <S%G3870>comfort<s%>, <S%G5426>be<s%> of <S%G846>one<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%>, live in <S%G1514>peace<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2842>communion<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>. The second letter to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
